titles.title: Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Tenth Congress.

action.text: Mr. Gutknecht asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/8/2006--Passed House without amendment. Orders the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Tenth Congress.
